Structs/EllipticCurve.html#/s:10CryptorE.abstract: Checks if two Curves are equal, required for Equatable protocol.

Structs/EllipticCurve.html#/s:10CryptorE.name: description
Structs/EllipticCurve.html#/s:10CryptorE.abstract: A String description of the Curve. Required for CustomStringConvertible protocol.

Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.name: asn1
Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.abstract: The r and s values of the signature encoded into an ASN1 sequence.

Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.name: init(r:s:)
Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.abstract: Initialize an ECSignature by providing the r and s values.

Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.name: init(asn1:)
Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.abstract: Initialize an ECSignature by providing an ASN1 encoded sequence containing the r and s values.

Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.name: verify(plaintext:using:)
Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.abstract: Verify the signature for a given String using the provided public key.

Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.name: verify(plaintext:using:)
Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.abstract: Verify the signature for the given Data using the provided public key.

Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.name: localizedDescription
Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.abstract: A human readable description of the error.

Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.name: invalidPEMString
Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.abstract: Error thrown when an invalid PEM String used to initialize a key.

Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.name: unknownPEMHeader
Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.abstract: Error thrown when the PEM header is not recognized.

Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.name: failedBase64Encoding
Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.abstract: Error thrown when a String fails to be Base64 encoded.

Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.name: failedASN1Decoding
Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.abstract: Error thrown when the ASN1 data could not be decoded to the expected structure.

Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.name: unsupportedCurve
Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.abstract: Error thrown when the key’s object identifier is for a curve that is not supported.

Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.name: failedNativeKeyCreation
Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.abstract: Error thrown when the key could not be converted to a native key (SecKey for Apple, EC_KEY for linux).

Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.name: failedEvpInit
Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.abstract: Error thrown when the encryption envelope fails to initialize.

Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.name: failedSigningAlgorithm
Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.abstract: Error thrown when the signing algorithm could not create the signature.

Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.name: invalidRSLength
Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.abstract: Error thrown when the provided R and S Data was not a valid length.

Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.name: failedEncryptionAlgorithm
Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.abstract: Error thrown when the encryption algorithm could not encrypt the plaintext.

Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.name: failedDecryptionAlgorithm
Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.abstract: Error thrown when the decryption algorithm could not decrypt the encrypted Data.

Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.name: failedUTF8Decoding
Structs/ECError.html#/s:10CryptorECC7ECE.abstract: Error thrown when the Data could not be decoded into a UTF8 String.
Checks if ECSigningErrors are equal, required for Equatable protocol.

Structs/ECError.html.name: ECError
Structs/ECError.html.abstract: A struct representing the different errors that can be thrown by BlueECC.

Structs/ECSignature.html.name: ECSignature
Structs/ECSignature.html.abstract: The signature produced by applying an Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm to some Plaintext data.

Structs/EllipticCurve.html.name: EllipticCurve
Structs/EllipticCurve.html.abstract: An extensible list of elliptic curves supported by this repository.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS10CryptorECC.name: encrypt(with:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS10CryptorECC.abstract: UTF8 encode the String to Data and encrypt it using the ECPublicKey.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS10CryptorECC.name: sign(with:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS10CryptorECC.abstract: UTF8 encode the String to Data and sign it using the ECPrivateKey.

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: decrypt(with:)
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Decrypt the encrypted data using the provided ECPrivateKey.

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: sign(with:)
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Sign the plaintext data using the provided ECPrivateKey.

Extensions/Data.html.name: Data
Extensions/Data.html.abstract: Extensions for encrypting, decrypting or signing Data using the appropriate algorithm determined by the key’s curve with the provided ECPrivateKey or ECPublicKey.

Extensions/String.html.name: String
Extensions/String.html.abstract: Extensions for encrypting or signing a String by converting it to UTF8 Data, then using the appropriate algorithm determined by the key’s curve with the provided ECPrivateKey or ECPublicKey.

Classes/ECPublicKey.html#/s:10CryptorECC.name: curveId
Classes/ECPublicKey.html#/s:10CryptorECC.abstract: A String description of the curve this key was generated from.

Classes/ECPublicKey.html#/s:10CryptorECC.name: pemString
Classes/ECPublicKey.html#/s:10CryptorECC.abstract: The public key represented as a PEM String.

Classes/ECPublicKey.html#/s:10CryptorECC.name: init(key:)
Classes/ECPublicKey.html#/s:10CryptorECC.abstract: Initialize an ECPublicKey from a .pem file format.

Classes/ECPrivateKey.html#/s:10CryptorEC.name: curveId
Classes/ECPrivateKey.html#/s:10CryptorEC.abstract: A String description of the curve this key was generated from.

Classes/ECPrivateKey.html#/s:10CryptorEC.name: init(key:)
Classes/ECPrivateKey.html#/s:10CryptorEC.abstract: Initialize an ECPrivateKey from a PEM String.

Classes/ECPrivateKey.html#/s:10CryptorEC.name: init(pkcs8DER:)
Classes/ECPrivateKey.html#/s:10CryptorEC.abstract: Initialize an ECPrivateKey from a PKCS8 .der file data.

Classes/ECPrivateKey.html#/s:10CryptorEC.name: init(sec1DER:)
Classes/ECPrivateKey.html#/s:10CryptorEC.abstract: Initialize an ECPrivateKey from a SEC1 .der file data.

Classes/ECPrivateKey.html#/s:10CryptorEC.name: extractPublicKey()
Classes/ECPrivateKey.html#/s:10CryptorEC.abstract: Initialize the ECPublicKeyfor this private key by extracting the public key bytes.
